title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Knowing what coworkers and supervisors expect of you makes it easier to get along with them. Perhaps you derive comfort from your harmonious interactions because you dont need to think about your next steps -- you can just take them. Although you can appear to be a reassuring picture of level-headedness, uncertainty may loom just beneath your professional mask. Nevertheless, strive to exceed your current goals but dont assume your powers of observation are giving you the whole story. Pay attention to the shifting landscape and adapt as necessary. Remember, if nothing ever changed, there would be no butterflies. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
